nodes.text: Yaladai was a spice variant that ran for a high price on the black market during the Galactic Civil War.

A powerful stimulant known to sell for prices many times higher than glitterstim, yaladai was pushed by spice dealers to those who wanted to experience the extreme clarity associated with the drug. Refreshing users, even if they had endured extended activity, the spice provided relaxation and focus. Extremely addictive, the long-term use of the drug would cost a lot of credits.

Forceful users of the stimulant found that it enhanced their ability to touch and control the Force. Despite this seemingly positive effects, it could often amplify negative emotions associated with the dark side.
